phrases.phrase: 술에 취할 때만 할 수 있어요.
meanings: 노래방 I'll only do it if I'm drunk.
(술·약·열기 등에) be[get] drunk, (formal) be[get] intoxicated, (formal) become inebriated; (약간) (informal) get tipsy
(도취하다) be drunk on[with], (formal) be enraptured, (literary) get intoxicated

meanings.meaning: there's only one thing for it
have the presence of mind to do something

vlive.korean: 잠을 잘 취할 수가 없어요. so I can't fall asleep. 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 컴백 카운트다운, D-8!!!
취할 수도 있는데. - 목축여. I can get drunk. - Drink up. 듣기 View video 슈주 리턴즈 : <슈주 기습 생방 #3> 슈주 자축 파티
vlive.english: I can get drunk. - Drink up.

vlive.korean: 분위기에 취할 수도 있잖아요. You can also get drunk on the mood. 듣기 View video VIXX : 도쿄에횩(feat.방수폰)
vlive.english: You can also get drunk on the mood.

vlive.korean: 어떤 자세로도 숙면을 취할 수 있죠. He can sleep in any position. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : 펜타곤 - 'Gorilla' M/V 촬영 비하인드 (M/V making behind)!
vlive.english: He can sleep in any position.

vlive.korean: 500cc에 취할 수가 있구나, 사람이. A person can get drunk off 500cc. 듣기 View video 화이브라더스 : <황우슬혜&민진웅> 금요일에 만나는 '혼술남녀'
vlive.english: A person can get drunk off 500cc.

examples.korean: Now that the problem has been identified, appropriate action can be taken. 발음듣기 이제 문제가 규명되었으니 적절한 조치를 취할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Now that the problem has been identified, appropriate action can be taken. 발음

examples.korean: I couldn't reach him. 발음듣기 그에게 연락을 취할 수가 없었다 Neungyule
I couldn't get in touch with him. 발음듣기 그에게 연락을 취할 수가 없었다 Neungyule
examples.english: I couldn't get in touch with him. 발음

examples.korean: That’s the only alternative. 발음듣기 그것이 취할 수 있는 유일한 방법이다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
Is there somebody we can contact in an emergency? 발음듣기 비상시 우리가 연락을 취할 수 있는 사람이 있나요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Is there somebody we can contact in an emergency? 발음
